A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am 32 years old\, I grew up watching the original trilogy. I stood in line for 8 hours when the first prequil came out\, the prequils were underwhelming but they still felt like star wars. This movie failed\, and i mean failed bad. If it was just one movie ot failed i could live with that but it ruined the entire franchise. Let me be clear. If you can get past the plot holes and someone flying through space. It isnt a terrible movie. But to be one of the main movies in star wars and not a spin off like rouge 1 is beyon dissapointing. It took a part of my childhood that i loved and it killed it. I don't care what happens now nor do i want to see anything else about dtarwars. Congratulations rian you are the killer of a franchise.
